context.title: Resorption Shantytown,
context.subtitle: A platform to accelerate the resorption of shantytowns
context.text: A tool for information, sharing and steering, the platform offers a high-performance and effective solution for shantytown resorption. It enables the creation of a real collaborative dynamic, within a territory, between the actors committed to the objective of resorption.

1.text: It's great because you have the info online, you're not faced with an excel spreadsheet with codes you don't understand.
1.author: Prefecture Seine-Saint-Denis

2.text: The platform made the information more reliable, because the Excel table was not shared. The more collaborative tools we have, the better.
2.author: City of Poitiers

3.text: I was able to direct the family of a person I was accompanying to a solidarity house from the location of their shantytown.
3.author: Haute-Garonne Association

secondSection.title: Complete resorption of shantytowns,
secondSection.subtitle: a national objective
secondSection.firstParagraph: A shantytown is a piece of land, a wasteland or a built-up area that generally lacks basic services (water, electricity, waste management) and is illegally occupied by several families.

secondParagraph.bold: The government sets a clear objective of shanty town resorption by moving away from an evacuation-centred approach to a global approach.
secondParagraph.normal: combining social inclusion, respect for public order and prevention of resettlement. In all the territories concerned, effective, humane and pragmatic multi-partner actions must be implemented.
secondParagraph.link: More about the shantytown resorption policy

secondBanner.text: Neighbour, citizen, slum dweller... Any news? A question ? An alert?

firstParagraph.bold: More than 30 shantytown resorption actions carried out in 2019 by 35 operators.
firstParagraph.normal:
These actions are financed 75% by the State, 15% by local authorities and 10% by private or European funds. 
Teams of professionals support families living in shantytowns, squats or housing in all aspects: health, housing, employment, education, stabilising and securing the site.

secondParagraph.title: A project led by the Interministerial Delegation for Housing and Access to Housing
